from string import Template
t = Template('${village}folk send $$10 to $cause.')
t.substitute(village='Nottingham', cause='the ditch fund')

'Nottinghamfolk send $10 to the ditch fund.'

å¦‚æœåœ¨å­—å…¸æˆ–å…³é”®å­—å‚æ•°ä¸­æœªæä¾›æŸä¸ªå ä½ç¬¦çš„å€¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ string.Template.substitute() æ–¹æ³•å°†æŠ›å‡º KeyErrorã€‚å¯¹äº mail-merge é£æ ¼çš„åº”ç”¨ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·æä¾›çš„æ•°æ®æœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯ä¸å®Œæ•´çš„ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨ string.Template.safe_substitute() æ–¹æ³•æ›´åŠ åˆé€‚ â€”â€” å¦‚æœæ•°æ®ç¼ºå¤±ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šç›´æ¥å°†å ä½ç¬¦åŸæ ·ä¿ç•™ã€‚

t = Template('Return the $item to $owner.')
d = dict(item='unladen swallow')
t.substitute(d)

Template çš„å­ç±»å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰åˆ†éš”ç¬¦ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯æŸä¸ªç…§ç‰‡æµè§ˆå™¨çš„æ‰¹é‡é‡å‘½ååŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨äº†ç™¾åˆ†å·ä½œä¸ºæ—¥æœŸã€ç…§ç‰‡åºå·å’Œç…§ç‰‡æ ¼å¼çš„å ä½ç¬¦ï¼š

import time, os.path
from string import Template

photofiles = ['img_1074.jpg', 'img_1076.jpg', 'img_1077.jpg']
class BatchRename(Template):
    delimiter = '%'
fmt = input('Enter rename style (%d-date %n-seqnum %f-format):  ')

t = BatchRename(fmt)
date = time.strftime('%d%b%y')
for i, filename in enumerate(photofiles):
    base, ext = os.path.splitext(filename)
    newname = t.substitute(d=date, n=i, f=ext)
    print('{0} --> {1}'.format(filename, newname))
